projects: [{"title":"Long term Analysis of Tropical Cyclones and Extreme events over the Northern Indian Ocean","start_date":"Jan 2020","description":"Long-term Analysis of TC activity over the NIO regions using the machine learning technique on different time scales and identifying the regions responsible for cyclogenesis."},{"title":"Spatial and Temporal Changes in Methane Emissions over India from 2003 - 2012.","start_date":"Jul 2018","end_date":"Jul 2019","description":"Analysis of the Spatial and Temporal change in methane emission from agricultural activities and other anthropogenic activities over Indian region since last 10 years using GOSAT & ENVISAT Data."},{"title":"Automatic Railway Crossing Controller","start_date":"Dec 2016","end_date":"May 2017","description":"The Aim of this project was to design an automatic railway crossing system by using micro-controllerand magnetic sensor. Sensor is used for finding the distance of the Train at a fixed distance . These sensor is placedso that whenever a train passes it, Sensor Generate a low signal pulse that is received by the microcontroller, passesto the Circuit which give us the information about the train and close or open the railway crossing."}]
